title: Learning from Less: Bayesian Neural Networks for Optimization Proxy using Limited Labeled Data
details: P Pareek, K Sundar, D Deka, S Misra - NeurIPS 2024 Workshop on Bayesian Decision …
abstract: This work introduces a learning scheme using Bayesian Neural Networks (BNNs) to solve constrained optimization problems in a setting with limited labeled data and restricted model training time. We propose a Semi-Supervised BNN for this practical …
